GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an array of one article object

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an array of one article object updated with increase or decrease in vote count

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of comments for the given article ID
